scripts.deploy_common: git add -A && git commit -m "deploy" && npm version patch && git push
scripts.deploy_fillergame: git pull && node deploy.js fillergame && npm run deploy_common
scripts.deploy_wow: git pull && node deploy.js wow && npm run deploy_common
scripts.deploy_website: git pull && node deploy.js website && npm run deploy_common
scripts.deploy_webapp: git pull && node deploy.js webapp && npm run deploy_common
scripts.deploy_podio: git pull && node deploy.js podio && npm run deploy_common
scripts.deploy_snippets: git pull && node deploy.js snippets && npm run deploy_common
